original_title: São Cristóvão – À Sombra do Passado
overview: Have you ever imagined what it is like to support a team that hasn't won a title in 94 years? São Cristóvão de Futebol e Regatas, the birthplace of superstars like Ronaldo Fenômeno, resists against all expectations. More than football, this is a film about love.
title: São Cristóvão – À Sombra do Passado
